name: linkedin
description: LinkedIn is an online professional social network created in 2002 in Mountain View, California. It was launched in May 2003. The site has been available in French since 2007. On June 13, 2016, Microsoft announced the acquisition of the social network for $26.2 billion.

name: discord
description: Discord is a VoIP and instant messaging platform. It works on Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS, and web browsers. It is distributed as freeware and developed with proprietary license.

name: slack
description: Slack is a proprietary collaborative communication platform created by Stewart Butterfield. It is widely used in the professional world.

name: trello
description: Trello is an online project management tool. It was created by Fog Creek Software in 2011 and was acquired by Atlassian in January 2017.

name: dribbble
description: Dribbble is a platform for sharing graphic creations. Users can share screenshots of their ongoing or completed work, comment on them, and like them.

name: smashing magazine
description: Magazine on CSS, JavaScript, front-end, accessibility, UX, and design. For developers, designers, and front-end engineers.
